snippet.title: Vectrex : Hyperchase
snippet.description:
Playing Vectrex games on Linux using sdlmess :
Hyperchase

Hyperchase is a racing game from 1982 with stunning gfx (for the time being) and incredible speed effect.

Unfortunately, the game is suffering from a really hard gameplay ( Even if you try to be gentle on the joystick, you'll eventually crash on the wall right away )
